text: In nomine domini Ihesu Christi.Ic Eadgar cing cyðe on þisse bec þæt is Cristes boc þæt ic habba þa fif hyda æt Womburnan agifen Gode & Sancta Maria for me sylfne & for mine yldran ðe þar restat æt Scireburnan, Aðelbold cing & æthelbyrht cing.
& ðis ic habbe idon for ure ealra saule lufon to ecre reste.

Gif hwa beo swa dyrtig þæt þis abrece oððe awenden wylle, þas mine gife & sylene mid ænegum uncræfte þære stowe atbredan þence oððe wille, wite he on domes dæge riht to agildanne beoforan Gode & eallum his halgum nymþe bute he hit ær her on worolde gebete.
Ic Eadgar cyning mid þara halgan rodetacn ðis hate swiþe geornlice getrymman & gefæstnian.
